snippet: The gunman who killed a professor and himself may have also killed a woman in Minnesota, and may have intended to kill another professor, the authorities said.
abstract: Los Angeles police officials say gunman Mainak Sarkar, who fatally shot UCLA Prof William S Klug before killing himself, had so-called kill list in his home; list included Klug and Ashley Hasti, who was also found dead of gunshot wound in her home in Brooklyn Park, Minn, as well as name of one other UCLA professor.

byline.original: By IAN LOVETT, RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA and JACK HEALY
byline.contributor: Ian Lovett reported from Los Angeles, Richard Pérez-Peña from New York, and Jack Healy from Brooklyn Park, Minn.

lead_paragraph: The gunman who killed a professor and himself may have also killed a woman in Minnesota, and may have intended to kill another professor, the authorities said.

headline.main: U.C.L.A. Gunman May Have Targeted 2nd Professor and Killed Woman
headline.print_headline: U.C.L.A. Gunman May Have Targeted 2nd Professor and Killed Woman
